snippet: Tests of remains have determined that three soldiers initially reported as missing were killed when a Mexican military helicopter was shot down Friday by a drug cartel.
abstract: Mexican authorities announce that six soldiers, rather than initially reported three, died in crash of military helicopter that was shot down by Jalisco New Generation drug gang.
lead_paragraph: Tests of remains have determined that three soldiers initially reported as missing were killed when a Mexican military helicopter was shot down Friday by a drug cartel.

headline.main: Toll Climbs to 6 in Mexican Helicopter Downing
headline.print_headline: Toll Climbs to 6 in Copter Downing
